newsitem.title: USA: Presstek board sets 2-for-1 stock split.
newsitem.headline: Presstek board sets 2-for-1 stock split.

text.p: Presstek Inc said on Friday that its board has declared a two-for-one split of its common stock, to be effected with the issuance of a 100 percent stock dividend.
The dividend is payable July 7 to holders of common stock on June 12, it said.
